data.name: Garrison: A Mercenary's Story
data.detailed_description:
Garrison is a Mercenary, who is trying to find new hope after getting chased out of his born and raised country on another land. His parents were murdered and he was left for the wolves, he has no siblings and no other family he knows of. So he decided when he was old enough to set out into the world to find hope and a better civilization. He'll make friends, meet enemies and monsters, and have to deal with bosses. He's going to need your help.

The game features a 3D open world exploration adventure with plenty of opportunities to explore and quests to do. You'll be able to battle and make gold and find items and gain experience. We also have an inventory system to make sure you can keep your character equipped with the best stuff possible. As you go along playing the game you'll meet companions that will join you in your adventures.

We have much more in store for you as we progress through the coming months.

Feel free to join our Discord!
https://discord.gg/guzm2XWC8n

data.short_description: Garrison is a Mercenary, who is trying to find new hope after getting chased out of his born and raised country on another land.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1 gigahertz (GHz) or faster 32-bit (x86) or 64-bit (x64)
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 graphics device with WDDM 1.0 or higher driver.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux (Not sure of the version just yet)
  • Processor: 16 x AMD Ryzen Eight Core Processor (Will lower in due time)
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Under Steam Play you may need to enable Proton 5.0-9 (Feel free to test this for me)
